member.name: T:SuperTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SuperTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SuperTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuHelpAbout_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Gives the information about the application

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuFileNew_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: For creating a new file in the text editor. Clear the screen and reset all the variables to default

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuFileOpen_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: To load a file to the text editor box. Using Read To End function to load the data of file some stream objects to load the path of the file and to read that path.

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuFileSave_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: To save the file, if file path already exists overrites the file if not creates a new path like the save as.

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuFileSaveAs_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: To create a new file with new or existing data. Creates a new file path for the file saving object file stream used to access the file path

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuEditCopy_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: To create a copy of the data existing in the text editor. Copies the selected text into the clipboard and then make a copy of that.

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuEditCut_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: To remove the selected text from the text editor and puts that text into set text method

member.name: M:SuperTextEditor.frmEditor.mnuEditPaste_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Insert the data in the text editor. Take data from the clipboard and insert where selected
